poemsDataJson.list_full: 来(こ)ぬ人(ひと)を まつほの浦(うら)の 夕(ゆふ)なぎに 焼(や)くや藻塩(もしほ)の 身(み)もこがれつつ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Like the salt sea-weed,//Burning in the evening calm.//On Matsuo's shore,//All my being is aflame,//Awaiting her who does not come.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Konu hito o|Matsu-ho no ura no|Yūnagi ni|Yaku ya moshio no|Mi mo kogare tsutsu
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: やくやもしほの みもこかれつつ
poemsDataJson.author: 権中納言定家(ごんちゅうなごんさだいえ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 待てども来ぬ人を待つ女心のもどかしさ、嘆き
